00050     virtual InsnSemanticsExpr::TreeNodePtr evidence_for_variable(uint64_t varno) {
00051         char buf[64];
00052         snprintf(buf, sizeof buf, "v%"PRIu64, varno);
00053         return evidence_for_name(buf);
00054     }
00055     virtual InsnSemanticsExpr::TreeNodePtr evidence_for_variable(const InsnSemanticsExpr::TreeNodePtr &var) {
00056         InsnSemanticsExpr::LeafNodePtr ln = var->isLeafNode();
00057         assert(ln && !ln->is_known());
00058         return evidence_for_variable(ln->get_name());
00059     }
